動物用藥品名稱: 禽保雞傳染性喉頭氣管炎活毒疫苗
業者名稱: 卜蜂(台灣)股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 預防雞感染傳染性喉頭氣管炎。
ingredients: QUANTITATIVE FORMULA: TYPICAL DOSE VIRUS CONTENT: FOWL LARYNGOTRACHEITIS VIRUS( HUDSON STRAIN) AT LEAST 10^3.3EID50;SUPERNATE FROM ILT MEMBRANE HARVEST 0.0199409ML; ILT HARVESTFLUIDS(AA) 0.0066470ML; STABILIZER SOLUTION 0.0027851ML;PENICILLIN/STREPTOMYCIN SOLUTION 0.0000886ML; BLUE DYE SOLUTION0.0005384ML.
